= Installation =

  # _This is a temporary step until login control developement is finished :_ *Protect the admin/ folder* using your web server (like .htacess on Apache)
  # *Open the web site in your browser*, the installation will start automatically. If not, open the install/ folder in your browser.
  # Follow the instructions that are given and provide the necessary informations.
  # *Delete, rename and/or protect* the install/ folder, otherwise anyone could reinstall your website !
  # Be creative ! You can create your own template, the template engine documentation is provided in the templates/ folder.
